channel.title: Range bonus won't stack with multiple items
channel.description:
bolts -- 120 range str shield -- 150 range str
equip shield, it gives 150 ranged str, equip bolts aswell, it stays at 150, equip a crossbow, it goes to 120... how to allow the range str to stack with multiple items?
this is a 667 rsps source

item.title: Range bonus won't stack with multiple items

item.description:

bolts – 120 range str
shield – 150 range str

equip shield, it gives 150 ranged str, equip bolts aswell, it stays at 150, equip a crossbow, it goes to 120… how to allow the range str to stack with multiple items?
